title: Fortnite has hooked a generation, but how long can the craze last?
text:
Finally, ‘The End’ is over. Gaming phenomenon Fortnite’s self-imposed blackout has given way to Fortnite: Chapter 2, a revitalised version of Epic’s industry-shaking behemoth that gives its players a whole new island to play around in, boats to sail and pogo sticks to bounce.

For the uninitiated, on Sunday night the Fortnite game world was sucked into a black hole, along with all of its players. The game then shut down, leading to fevered speculation as to when it would return with a new updated version of the game.

This morning, it finally did.

Nothing particularly epoch-making, there, you might think. And in many ways, Fortnite: Chapter Two is a familiar tale in the sequel-happy gaming industry....
